l.3 reg., orig. hόσα
The curse is written left-to-right while the names of the victims are written right-to-left. (Arena)

l.5 reg., orig. ΜΑΜΑΡΕΙṐΙΜαμαρειṑι
Horizontal writing on two lines, mostly left-right, but with some (parts of) words inverted right-left.
